title: Question 8
prompt:
Sentence 20: A good rule of thumb is to give your employer notice equal to your yearly vacation days.

Which of the following is the best rewrite of sentence 20?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
This sentence has two equivalent phrases on either side of the word “is.”
A good rule of thumb is to give your employer notice equal to your yearly vacation days.
The sentence can be restructured by transposing, or switching, these ideas. The resulting sentence is “Giving your employer notice equal to your yearly vacation days is a good rule of thumb.”


Giving your employer notice equal to your yearly vacation days is a good rule of thumb.
